title: Typographic Times: Luc(as) de Groot, Corpid, FontStruct & London Underground
content:
October 2008 issue of the [**Typographic Times**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151529/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/):

- [Interview of Luc(as) de Groot](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151529/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/designer/de-groot.html)  
“I think type design should be a mixture of intuition and calculation.”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/15-corpid_5172.jpg)
- Portrait of the [Luc(as) de Groot’s Corpid](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151529/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/typeface/corpid.html) and the [Richard Kegler’s London Underground](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151529/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/typeface/london-underground.html) typefaces.
- [Introduction to the FontStruct project](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151529/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/fontstruct.html) by his creator Rob Meek.
- [Photoreportage on the Alde Manuce house in Venice](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151529/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/alde-manuce.html).
author: Typook
